message.body: Do you remember that movie we watched called Remember Me? The kid winds up dying in the world trade center at the end?

Would you ever want to watch that again? Because I might watch it tonight if you don't care about it. But if you would watch it, tell me. I'll save it for when we can't find a movie to watch, which happens quite a lot.
I'll watch it again. I'll be back earlier. I'm not meeting Katch later.
Really? You did not cancel because of me did you?
No, she had something for work come up so she came to visit me on my lunch break instead.
Ok. I'm a little more perky now. See you later.
Roberts in the bathroom. You can watch it without me if you want. I dint know when I'll be back
I was only going to watch it to kill a few hours before you got home. I'm not watching it. You can come here to shower you know.
I'm officially assigned a ticket (usually sent only to programmers) to work on a sentence segmentation tool.
:) I'm proud of you. That's really nice to hear. You're doing great there.
Jesus. I don't want to go to this thing.
